price: ‹ ߛߎߓߊ߮ › ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߴߏ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߕߣߊ߬ ߘߌ߫ ، ߓߊ ߊ߲ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ߕߐ߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
